sentences.en: "You've no objection, I take it?" — "Of course not."
A bigger objection is that aggregation of the results invites distortion.
sentences.cn: 一种更大的异议是把各种结果集中考虑容易导致曲解。

sentences.en: Despite objections by the White House, the Senate voted today to cut off aid.
sentences.cn: 尽管白宫反对，参议院今天投票中断援助。

sentences.en: He made a long speech defending his views from objection.
sentences.cn: 他作了长篇讲演来保护他的观点不遭反对.

sentences.en: Her objection was that he was too young.
sentences.cn: 她反对的理由是他太小。

sentences.en: How can the soft - determinist meet this objection?
sentences.cn: 柔性决定论者怎么面对这个反面意见 呢 ?

sentences.en: I had my objection all prepared, but Stephens forestalled me.
sentences.cn: 我已做好准备要提出反对意见, 不料斯蒂芬斯却抢先了一步.

sentences.en: I have no objection to banks making money.
sentences.cn: 我对银行营利并不抵触。

sentences.en: I have no objection to him coming to stay.
I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
sentences.cn: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

sentences.en: Many authors entertain, not only a foolish, but a really dishonest objection.
sentences.cn: 许多作家抱着一种不仅是愚笨的, 而且的确是不诚实的态度.

sentences.en: None of them raised any objection.
sentences.cn: 他们谁也没提出反对意见.

sentences.en: Some managers have recently raised objection to the PFA handling these negotiations.
sentences.cn: 一些主教练最近就英格兰职业足球运动员协会负责这些谈判提出了异议。

sentences.en: The chief objection to this book is its great length.
sentences.cn: 这本书的主要缺点是篇幅太长.

sentences.en: The Congress overrode the President's objection and passed the law.
sentences.cn: 国会不顾总统的反对,通过了那项法令.

sentences.en: They made an objection to the imperial system with resolution.
This objection had been voiced even in the sixteenth century.
sentences.cn: 早在十六世纪已经有过这种反对的意见了.

words.tran_cn: 讨厌的；会引起反对的；有异议的

trans.tran_cn: 反对，反对的话，异议，反对的理由
trans.tran_en: a reason that you have for opposing or disapproving of something, or something you say that expresses this
